items.sentence: It\'s on this point that our opinions differ.
It\'s rude to ask someone how much they earn.
Tom said it wasn\'t him who broke the window.

Why don\'t we go and see the cherry blossoms?
Something seems to be wrong with my computer.
Swimming is good exercise for the whole body.
Take your umbrella with you in case it rains.
Would you like to see some photos of my trip?
Would you please have a look at these papers?
You must be careful in choosing your friends.
I could hear birds singing outside my window.
I have too many things on my mind these days.
I couldn\'t fall asleep because of the noise.
I don\'t think I could do that kind of thing.
You\'re much taller than I thought you\'d be.
You\'ve put on a little weight, haven\'t you?
I suspect Tom expects me to help him do that.

I suspect Tom is waiting for us in the lobby.
I suspect that Tom is in his office, working.
Why is taking pictures of trains interesting?
You must not discuss this matter with anyone.
Your PhD thesis has to be written in English.
I\'m convinced Tom didn\'t do anything wrong.
Washing the car took longer than we expected.

Where\'s the nearest gas station around here?

I\'ve done everything that you told me to do.
